Lonely #20, MJ’s 1st, May 5, 2008

Posted on April 14, 2012 by mike

Well..I hope you’re enjoying my journey so far. Got back from NM on May 4th and right away had another shoot set for May 5th with this fabulous gal named Mary Jane who’d otherwise be known as MJ in my shoots!Â  And, looking back right now, I can’t believe I shot 4 gals in 5 days in 2 states!!! LOL…I hope the quality is hanging in there but that’s a bit much. Luckily, the full-time job wasn’t too demanding at the time as the Mining Co’s venture into CadCam wasn’t in such hot demand.

Anyway, MJ is/was a gem. She’ll show up twice more in my work and I just loved shooting with her. She actually came by my house on May 5th and I was hanging with my friend, JB, who’ll also show up in the book @ some point. So, with JB present, we had MJ try some outfits on and give us a demonstration of how casual she’d be to work with…and thus I was psyched to roll. Not everyone I worked with is as simple and “go with the flow” as MJ, and I look back on her with a big smile. Basically game for any idea I had and that was such a blessing.

Well, at the time, MJ had married a marine who’d been sent off to Iraq. Thus, we were gifted with his M16 and camo gear for our shoot! Wooo Hooo, America ROCKS and our Armed Forces should be proud of MJ. She is a stunning woman with intense black eyes,Â long black hair and some gorgeous tattoos. She also has a butt & a half…and that M16 looked fabulous next to it. Hope you agree?!?!?

MJ’s hair was fun to watch fly around and with a bit of wind that day it really looked majestic in a couple shots. We also had this wonderful sky that day with clouds resembling cotton balls….Hence, we brought this white, fur vest and white feather duster which also seemed to give us some cool options. LOL..I forget how rediculous some of my props are/were. Target, Ross Dress for Less, Mervyns, Marshalls…all should be proud of the stuff I incorporate.

Well, as a summary, I’ve included a shot of MJ snacking between takes. Some of the candid stuff I captured during the four years of Lonely #1 is some of my best stuff…and I just think she looks cute as hell sitting on the hood of the company car eating her meal.

MJ the Goddess! ðŸ™‚
